root.name: textFont()
root.description: Sets the current font. The font must be loaded with loadFont() before it can be used as the current font. This font and size will be used in all subsequent calls to the text() function.

parameter.label: font
parameter.description: PFont: any variable of the type PFont

parameter.label: size
parameter.description: int or float: the size of the letters in units of pixels
